verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: < p >] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he will announce the site for a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un within three days] .
< p > President Donald Trump said he [V: will] announce the site for a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un within three days .
< p > President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: the site for a summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: within three days] .
